Ingredients.1: 2 stalks celery, cut into large chunks

Ingredients.2: 2 medium carrots, peeled and cut into large chunks

Ingredients.3: 1 medium onions, peeled and cut into wedges

Directions.1: Place celery, carrots, and onion in the bottom of a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®). Pat chicken dry and place on top of the vegetables. Sprinkle chicken evenly with salt, pepper, and paprika.

Directions.2: Close and lock the lid. Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 25 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.

Directions.3: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid. Remove chicken and let stand for 5 minutes before cutting or shredding.

Directions.4: Strain solids from the cooking liquid, if desired. Set to Saute, and reduce by half for a flavorful sauce.
